sn45.19:1.3: Katamam nu kho, avuso, brahmacariyam, katamam brahmacariyapariyosanan”ti?
sn45.19:1.5: Bhaddako kho te, avuso bhadda, ummango, bhaddakam patibhanam, kalyani paripuccha.
sn45.19:1.8: Katamam nu kho, avuso, brahmacariyam, katamam brahmacariyapariyosanan’”ti?
sn45.19:1.10: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo brahmacariyam, seyyathidam—
sn45.19:1.12: Yo kho, avuso, ragakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—
